name: CBPeripheralManagerDelegate
desc: A protocol that provides updates for local peripheral state and interactions with remote central devices.

items.name: func peripheralManagerDidUpdateState(CBPeripheralManager)
items.desc: Tells the delegate the peripheral manager’s state updated.

items.name: func peripheralManager(CBPeripheralManager, willRestoreState: [String : Any])
items.desc: Tells the delegate the system is about to restore the peripheral manager.

items.name: func peripheralManager(CBPeripheralManager, didAdd: CBService, error: Error?)
items.desc: Tells the delegate the peripheral manager published a service to the local GATT database.

items.name: func peripheralManagerDidStartAdvertising(CBPeripheralManager, error: Error?)
items.desc: Tells the delegate the peripheral manager started advertising the local peripheral device’s data.

items.name: func peripheralManager(CBPeripheralManager, central: CBCentral, didSubscribeTo: CBCharacteristic)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a remote central device subscribed to a characteristic’s value.

items.name: func peripheralManager(CBPeripheralManager, central: CBCentral, didUnsubscribeFrom: CBCharacteristic)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a remote central device unsubscribed from a characteristic’s value.

items.name: func peripheralManagerIsReady(toUpdateSubscribers: CBPeripheralManager)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a local peripheral device is ready to send characteristic value updates.

items.name: func peripheralManager(CBPeripheralManager, didReceiveRead: CBATTRequest)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a local peripheral received an Attribute Protocol (ATT) read request for a characteristic with a dynamic value.

items.name: func peripheralManager(CBPeripheralManager, didReceiveWrite: [CBATTRequest])
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a local peripheral device received an Attribute Protocol (ATT) write request for a characteristic with a dynamic value.

items.name: func peripheralManager(CBPeripheralManager, didPublishL2CAPChannel: CBL2CAPPSM, error: Error?)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the peripheral manager created a listener for incoming L2CAP channel connections.

items.name: func peripheralManager(CBPeripheralManager, didUnpublishL2CAPChannel: CBL2CAPPSM, error: Error?)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the peripheral manager removed a published service from the local system.

items.name: func peripheralManager(CBPeripheralManager, didOpen: CBL2CAPChannel?, error: Error?)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the peripheral manager opened an L2CAP channel.
